message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $120 is a bit out of my range. I'd be happy to pay $85 for the product.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high. How about $95?  I'm really hoping to get a good deal on this product!
Hi Bob, I understand that $105 was still a bit out of your range. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $102.
